mapper.select: select timeline_code from tbl_room_timeline where room_no = #{room_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_room_timeline( timeline_no, cinema_no, room_no, room_type_code, movie_code, movie_begin_date, movie_finish_date, movie_status ) values ( seq_timeline_no.nextval, #{cinema_no}, #{room_no}, #{room_type_code}, #{movie_code}, to_timestamp(#{movie_begin_date},'HH24:MI:SS'), to_timestamp(#{movie_finish_date},'HH24:MI:SS'), #{movie_status} )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_room_timeline timeline left outer join tbl_movie movie on timeline.movie_code = movie.movie_code left outer join tbl_cinema_room room on timeline.room_no = room.room_no where timeline_no = #{timeline_no}
mapper.update: update tbl_room_timeline set room_no = #{room_no}, room_type_code = #{room_type_code}, movie_code = #{movie_code}, movie_begin_date = to_timestamp(#{movie_begin_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), movie_finish_date = to_timestamp(#{movie_finish_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), movie_status = #{movie_status} where timeline_no = #{timeline_no}
